items.title_original: Lorentzian Logic: Solving Unknown Cluster Numbers via Differentiable Graph Entropy
items.title_neutral: Lorentzian Logic: Solving Unknown Cluster Numbers via Differentiable Graph Entropy
items.excerpt: Optimize network analysis with LSEnet, a deep learning model that eliminates the need to predefined cluster numbers. By leveraging the Lorentz model of hyperbolic space and differentiable structural information, it identifies optimal hierarchies through self-organized gradient backpropagation.
items.recap_neutral: Optimize network analysis with LSEnet, a deep learning model that eliminates the need to predefined cluster numbers
items.main_idea: Lorentzian Logic: Solving Unknown Cluster Numbers via Differentiable Graph Entropy

items.title_original: LSEnet: Mastering Automated Data Grouping in Curved Hyperbolic Space
items.title_neutral: LSEnet: Mastering Automated Data Grouping in Curved Hyperbolic Space
items.excerpt: Meet LSEnet, the neural net that organizes complex networks into optimal partitioning trees using the Lorentz model. By ditching flat Euclidean space for curved hyperbolic geometry, it recursively learns parent nodes using a self-supervised clustering objective.
items.recap_neutral: Meet LSEnet, the neural net that organizes complex networks into optimal partitioning trees using the Lorentz model
items.main_idea: LSEnet: Mastering Automated Data Grouping in Curved Hyperbolic Space

items.title_original: Smart Data Grouping: LSEnet & Automated Graph Clustering in Curved Space
items.title_neutral: Smart Data Grouping: LSEnet & Automated Graph Clustering in Curved Space
items.excerpt: Stop guessing your cluster numbers. Discover LSEnet, a deep graph clustering model that uses Differentiable Structural Information (DSI) and the Lorentz model of hyperbolic space to organize complex networks automatically.
items.recap_neutral: Stop guessing your cluster numbers
items.main_idea: Smart Data Grouping: LSEnet & Automated Graph Clustering in Curved Space

items.title_original: Smart Graph Clustering: Organizing Networks Automatically
items.title_neutral: Smart Graph Clustering: Organizing Networks Automatically
items.excerpt: Explore the frontier of geometric deep learning and non-Euclidean optimization. Master Kuramoto model training, hyperbolic reinforcement learning, and deep graph clustering without predefined cluster numbers using LSEnet and Structural Entropy.
items.recap_neutral: Explore the frontier of geometric deep learning and non-Euclidean optimization
items.main_idea: Smart Graph Clustering: Organizing Networks Automatically
